title: Facebook-Based Collaborative Learning Program for Architectural Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Collaborative Competency Enhancement Program for Architects via Facebook-Based Collaborative Learning and VR Simulations in a BYOD Hybrid Environment

learning_goals: Learners can execute real-time collaboration protocols with peers via Facebook Groups in architectural project simulation environments at least three times
Learners can generate two or more creative solutions to architectural spatial problems using VR-based design tools and receive peer evaluations on Facebook feedback boards
Learners can lead knowledge sharing related to architectural projects through Facebook Community features and achieve participation rates of 4.0/5.0 or higher in learning satisfaction surveys
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
